RClusterCT

Classify cell types in single-cell RNA sequencing expeirments using reference bulk RNA-seq data sets. See detailed vignettes and documentation here.

Workflow

  1. Load a single-cell RNA-seq data set (SparseMatrix or data.frame). Normalize (?) with scran.

  2. Load the reference data type (i.e., bulk RNA-seq data, a gene set (ordered or unordered))

  3. Compute correlations between single-cell and reference data types. Classify on per-cell or per-cluster basis.

  4. Output per-cell or per-cluster, significance of the assignment.

  5. Visualize per-cell, per-cluster correlations in e.g. a t-SNE.
